targets.query: SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal") * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") / last("total") FROM "blockstat" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "datastore" =~ /^$datastore$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM blockstat WITH KEY=host WHERE object='host'
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM blockstat WITH KEY=host WHERE object='host'

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH KEY=instance WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/
list.label: Network Interfaces
list.name: nics
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM nics WITH KEY=instance WHERE "host" =~ /^$server$/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM blockstat WITH KEY=datastore WHERE "host"=~ /^$server$/
list.label: Datastore
list.name: datastore
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM blockstat WITH KEY=datastore WHERE "host"=~ /^$server$/
